thread.title: LETTERS: Hillary's problem the FBI, not the GOP
thread.title_full: LETTERS: Hillary's problem the FBI, not the GOP - Press Enterprise

author: PRESS-ENTERPRISE
title: LETTERS: Hillary's problem the FBI, not the GOP
text:
PRESS-ENTERPRISE
Published: Oct. 16, 2015 Updated: 5:22 p.m. During the first Democratic presidential debate, Hillary Clinton again stated that the House Benghazi committee investigation is nothing but a vast right-wing conspiracy out to destroy her chances at becoming president. Well, let’s look at the facts.
The way she went about hiring Sydney Blumenthal while secretary of state, and the way she exchanged classified information with him, even though he lacked a security clearance, were illegal.
The Benghazi investigators also discovered that Hillary was using an unsecured private email for official government business, also illegal and in violation of State Department regulations. It was later discovered that she had a personal email server at her home in upstate New York. It was also discovered that a State Department IT expert was sent to Hillary’s home to hook up her personal server, something which she then hid.
These are just a few of the illegal actions taken by Hillary. To date, Hillary is possibly looking at 13 felony violations. This is what she refers to as a vast right-wing conspiracy against her.
Hillary should not fear the Republicans; her biggest fear should be the FBI. Hillary did all of this by herself, and she has no one to blame except herself.
David Baker
Riverside
WRITE A LETTER TO THE EDITOR: Letters to the Editor: E-mail to letters@pe.com . Please provide your name, city and telephone number (telephone numbers will not be published). Letters of about 200 words will be given preference. Letters will be edited for length, grammar and clarity.
